daily.text: I have learned that, although I am a good teacher, I am a much better student, and I was blessed to learn valuable lessons from my students on a daily basis. They taught me the importance of teaching to a student - and not to a test.
daily.author: Erin Gruwell

daily.text: Teaching does allow me to keep one foot in the youthful waters I tend to occupy in my novels, so I'm thankful for that. My students also remind me on a daily basis that the stories I collected during my district attorney days are actually interesting to people who haven't had that experience.
daily.author: Alafair Burke

daily.text: Until you prove what is in you, what is in you shall always be what is in you.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: It used to upset me - now it makes me sad - to see people use patriotism and our troops as a pawn in their political argument. Because I know personally, growing up in a military family, the sacrifice that is made on a daily basis.
daily.author: Tamron Hall

daily.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Some details in life may look insignificant but appear to be vital leitmotifs in a person's life. They may have the value of 'Rosebuds' of Citizen Kane or 'Madeleine cookies' of Marcel Proust or 'Strawberry fields' of the Beatles. People regularly walk down the memory lane of their early youth. The paper boats of their childhood are recurrently floating on the waves of their mind and bring back the mood and the spirit of the early days. They enable us to retreat from the trivial, daily worries and can generate delightful bliss and true joy in a sometimes frantic and chaotic life. ('Paper boats forever' ).
daily.author: Erik Pevernagie

daily.text: Staying indoors daily will eventually make you sick.
daily.author: Steven Magee

daily.text: It feels wistful to imagine a time when people didn't go about their daily routine with the assumption that at any moment another massive media technology will be dumped on us by some geek in California.
daily.author: Douglas Coupland

daily.text: You can be self-empowered and still learning about how you think about things daily.
daily.author: Tori Amos

daily.text: God is a life-giving light.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: The joy of this day is splendid.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: When I was instructed to use medical oxygen to do my job at the W. M. Keck Observatory from 2001 to 2006, I was never told about the legal health information that is now posted on oxygen cylinders. My memories of the green medical oxygen cylinders that we would use daily is that they had no information on them and we were never given a recognised legal oxygen administration training course for routine daily use or a medical prescription from a doctor. We were shown the three oxygen cylinders at the facility and told to use them whenever we developed headaches, which was multiple times daily. It was common to find all three oxygen cylinders in use by other very high altitude workers and to have to line up to get a turn on the magical medical gas.
daily.author: Steven Magee

daily.text: The Civil Rights Act of 1964 laid the foundation for the Voting Rights Act of 1965, but it also addressed nearly every other aspect of daily life in a would-be free democratic society.
daily.author: Aberjhani

daily.text: Ensure that your daily chores, thought, actions, speeches and steps are taken with the purpose of giving you a good brand. Decide to be who God wanted you to be.
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: Many losses have gone sinking daily by our inability to recognize the great deal of power reserved in us. Watch out and make it real because soon, it's going to be your turn to shine!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: Like most lit nerds, I'm a voracious reader. I never got enough poetry under my belt growing up but I do read it - some of my favorites, Gina Franco and Angela Shaw and Cornelius Eady and Kevin Young, remind me daily that unless the words sing and dance, what's the use of putting them down on paper.
daily.author: Junot Diaz

daily.text: The prizes go to those who meet emergencies successfully. And the way to meet emergencies is to do each daily task the best we can.
daily.author: William Feather

daily.text: By fundamentally changing how we design the places and systems that enable our daily lives, we can slash emissions way beyond the immediate carbon savings - because our own personal emissions are just the tip of a vast iceberg of energy and resources consumed far from our view.
daily.author: Alex Steffen

daily.text: Failure is a sign post, directing the right road for life’s journey.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: I Love You! Three words that mean nothing if not followed through with actions. It seems to be more relevant in the terms of showing verses saying. Anyone can say it, because there are different kinds of love. But, few are willing to actually show it. Saying is one thing. Living proof is another.
daily.author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

daily.text: The greatest riches are the gift of life, strength and wisdom.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: The existence of symmetry laws is in full accordance with our daily experience. The simplest of these symmetries, the isotropy and homogeneity of space, are concepts that date back to the early history of human thought.
daily.author: Chen-Ning Yang

daily.text: One of the most obvious ways dogs can improve our physical and mental health is via daily walks.
daily.author: Andrew Weil

daily.text: I had just left 'Saturday Night Live' when I came to 'The Daily Show,' and it just felt like Jon was on my side. I'll always be grateful to him for that. I just got the impression he wanted me to succeed, and then I wanted to succeed for him. I think that's good leadership.
daily.author: Rob Riggle

daily.text: My job is to be a spokesman - the spokesman, I suppose - for the President, for the White House, to do the daily briefings, to manage the press corps in terms of travel, day-to-day needs, access, interviews, all those issues.
daily.author: Dee Dee Myers

daily.text: In the morning, I use a Philosophy cleanser and Olay Regenerist Daily 3 Point Treatment Cream, which sinks in well and feels firming. I rarely wear foundation, so cotton wool soaked in warm water is often enough to cleanse at night, but I take off eye make-up with Klorane's cornflower-infused remover.
daily.author: Saffron Aldridge

daily.text: During my time in high altitude astronomy, I routinely witnessed workers breathing medical oxygen, industrial carbon dioxide, nitrogen and helium gas as part of their daily work routine.
daily.author: Steven Magee

daily.text: Think of exercise as medicine and take your daily prescription.
daily.author: Steven Magee

daily.text: The destiny of a man is determined by his daily action, God won't allow you go anywhere, if you don't make an attempt to move.
daily.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

daily.text: I found that dance, music, and literature is how I made sense of the world... It pushed me to think of things bigger than life's daily routines... To think beyond what is immediate or convenient.
daily.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

wanderlust.text: Being the people we are, and feeling the way that we do, getting excited about going somewhere new can be terrifying. Of course it is, I get it! But if you don’t travel, you’ll regret it. Your soul will forever be empty.
wanderlust.author: S.R. Crawford

wanderlust.text: There is no such thing as loving a child too much.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: You don't even know where I'm going.'I don't care. I'd like to go anywhere.
wanderlust.author: John Steinbeck

wanderlust.text: What we seek when we wander usually leads us back home.
wanderlust.author: Gina Greenlee

wanderlust.text: ...But I preferred reading the American landscape as we went along. Every bump, rise, and stretch in it mystified my longing.
wanderlust.author: Jack Kerouac

wanderlust.text: Bury me where I die.
wanderlust.author: Jane Bulos

wanderlust.text: Of course women's walking is often construed as performance rather than transport, with the implication that women walk not to see but to be seen, not for their own experience but for that of a male audience, which means that they are asking for whatever attention they receive.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: I get butterflies every time I wander beautiful places I've never been.
wanderlust.author: Katrice Cabral

wanderlust.text: I was forced to wander, having no one, forced by my nature to keep wandering because wandering was the only thing that I believed in, and the only thing that believed in me.
wanderlust.author: Roman Payne

wanderlust.text: You won't find me dancing in a club at night but you will find me climbing mountains to see the sunrise, with a glimmer of hope and a smile on my face ~ this is life baby and freedom fills my days.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.
wanderlust.author: Vladimir Nabokov

wanderlust.text: The best traveler is one without a camera.
wanderlust.author: Kamand Kojouri

wanderlust.text: If somebody tells you there's a rule, break it.
wanderlust.author: Hans Zimmer

wanderlust.text: I was lieing to myself when I thought I was lost, I have never been lost - I just wasn't ready to be found.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: You have to keep doing it, Even if no one is watching. The best artists, are those Who live from their expressions, Not chasing the impressions.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: Be a team player, not a bandwagon jumper.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: One soft humid early spring morning driving a winding road across Mount Tamalpais, the 2,500-foot mountain just north of the Golden Gate Bridge, a bend reveals a sudden vision of San Francisco in shades of blue, a city in a dream, and I was filled with a tremendous yearning to live in that place of blue hills and blue buildings, though I do live there, I had just left there after breakfast.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: Explore, Experience, Then Push Beyond.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: I took a night drive.I needed to get away.I needed to knowit's okay to goand have no destination,where time moves slowor doesn't exist.That life can be like this,aimless wandering,just breathing,living,driving forever underneath the stars.
wanderlust.author: Ava

wanderlust.text: I'm sorry! I really am! I wanted to get out of this place! I want to live! I want to get away from here and never see it again! I hate everything about it!'You will hate the next place, too,' I said. 'What you are you will carry with you.
wanderlust.author: Louis L'Amour

wanderlust.text: It sounds so far away and different. I like different places. I like any places that isn't here.
wanderlust.author: Edna Ferber

wanderlust.text: ..Luxury is the enemy of observation, a costly indulgence that induces such a good feeling that you notice nothing. Luxury spoils and infantilizes you and prevents you from knowing the world. That is its purpose, the reason why luxury cruises and great hotels are full of fatheads who, when they express an opinion, seem as though they are from another planet. It was also my experience that one of the worst aspects of travelling with wealthy people, apart from the fact that the rich never listen, is that they constantly groused about the high cost of living – indeed, the rich usually complained of being poor.
wanderlust.author: Paul Theroux

wanderlust.text: The beauty he saw in her was the beauty she forgot to see in herself and what a beautiful reminder, that love is what will see us all through.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: It's in those quiet little towns, at the edge of the world, that you will find the salt of the earth people who make you feel right at home.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: Through all his years of roving, even on nights like this, he had remained blind to the beauty of the sea, and now his feeling toward it had settled into weary hatred. He knew its effects of blended color, its wide gradations of sound and action, the tireless charm of a sailing ship's effortless movement, the quality of silent distance and the wonder of the skies. Dimly at times, in moments of rare emotion, he had caught a glimpse of the mystic hand that beckons beyond the horizon and felt for a little while the fated urge of the wanderer. But that was in the beginning, long ago when he had first gone to sea, and he had forgotten it.('Fire In The Galley Stove').
wanderlust.author: William Outerson

wanderlust.text: It was the inverse of an island in the sea.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: It was a place as blank as a sheet of paper. It was the place I had always been looking for... Flat expanses would call to me... These are the places where the desert is most itself: stark, open, free, an invitation to wander, a laboratory of perception, scale, light, a place where loneliness has a luxurious flavor...
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: It might be well enough to wander if you've a place and people to come back to, but I tell you now there's no desolation like wanting to go home and truly not knowing where it is.
wanderlust.author: Elizabeth Kerner

wanderlust.text: Let there be room left in your heart for the unimaginable ~ serendipity has a way of showing itself just when you feel like giving up.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

motivational.text: Take all of your wasted honorEvery little past frustrationTake all of your so-called problems,Better put 'em in quotations.
motivational.author: John Mayer

motivational.text: The only person you should ever fear losing in a relationship is you yourself.
motivational.author: Miya Yamanouchi

motivational.text: There is a root to every action, which is really a reaction to what is going on inside of us.
motivational.author: Tanya R. Liverman

motivational.text: The reason we have such a difficult time losing weight permanently is not because we are making bad choices, but because we are not stopping our automatic subconscious programmed behaviors in their tracks.
motivational.author: Elaine Moran

motivational.text: Don't lose heart, we're just rusty angels.
motivational.author: Stefan Emunds

motivational.text: For every can't, there's a can. Cans are worth money, so you'd better start collecting them.
motivational.author: Bianca McCormick-Johnson

motivational.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
motivational.author: Auliq-Ice

motivational.text: Christians sometimes make themselves into elephants afraid of mice. You have the Creator of the universe on your side; not to mention, you've been given eternal life. 'Whom or what shall you fear?' To be afraid of anything other than God himself is like an insult to God.
motivational.author: Criss Jami

motivational.text: Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.
motivational.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivational.text: If roses did not suffer thorns on their journey to beauty, they would lose out on becoming masterpieces.
motivational.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

motivational.text: Keep your promises and be consistent. Be the kind of person others can trust.
motivational.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivational.text: The holy country is occupied by holy citizens.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: Follow your heart. Then root its longing with the facts.
motivational.author: Gina Greenlee

motivational.text: To make 2013 (or any other)your year, keep it simple:1) Count your blessings first2) Whatever you did last year, Do it better3) Go step by step, One day at a time.4) Create/make your own opportunities.5) Believe in your abilities at all times,6) Qutting is not an option. Keep Going.7) Finish what you started.
motivational.author: Pablo

motivational.text: No wrong in aiming or applauding the win but always agnize one's efforts.
motivational.author: Mohith Agadi

motivational.text: With every step we take we have a choice to make. Our choices determine our actions. Our actions determine who we are.
motivational.author: Randall Marr

motivational.text: Success sits on a mountain of mistakes.
motivational.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

motivational.text: When a lion kills a deer it does not build negative KARMA, its meant that way!!!!
motivational.author: Harrish Sairaman

motivational.text: Not getting a straight answer is a straight answer.
motivational.author: Sarvesh Jain

motivational.text: The sadness sorrow is to desire death while you have life.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: First Cosmic Seal:(Devic Seal 333) One who has received this Cosmic Seal is empowered to control not less than 40,000 spirits.
motivational.author: Compton Gage

motivational.text: It is one thing to know what should be done, it is another to do it.
motivational.author: Steve Backley

motivational.text: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
motivational.author: Jay Samit

motivational.text: When you fall for your appetite too early, you may not be able to endure to the end.
motivational.author: Israelmore Ayivor

motivational.text: To become a better you, remember to be grateful to people who have contributed to making you who you are today.
motivational.author: Israelmore Ayivor

love.text: Don't compare your story to a movie or a book because it is written by a script writer and yours by God.
love.author: Anonymous

love.text: It is well to believe that there needs but a little more thought, a little more courage, more love, more devotion to life, a little more eagerness, one day to fling open wide the portals of joy and of truth.
love.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

love.text: If you are there for the Lord, He will be there for you. If you love Him and keep His commandments, you will have His Spirit to be with you and guide you.
love.author: Robert D. Hales

love.text: Humans have a fraught relationship with beasts. They are our companions and our chattel, our family members and our laborers, our household pets and our household pests. We love them and cage them, admire them and abuse them. And, of course, we cook and eat them.
love.author: Jeffrey Kluger

love.text: There are a lot of historical lofts in Houston, and it's amazing for me that a lot of them were built in the 1920s. I love the exposed bricks and the very industrial stuff.
love.author: Solange Knowles

love.text: He had never smoked but then had he ever loved? Life made him love and love made him smoke.
love.author: Faraaz Kazi

love.text: A great giftwe can giveto ourselvesis a willingnessto love everyone,no matter what.This frees us completely from the toxicjustificationswe use to hate.
love.author: Scott Stabile

love.text: Love was not enough to fight or I was not worth for fight.
love.author: Arzum Uzun

love.text: I fell in love with him. But I don't just stay with him by default as if there's no one else available to me. I stay with him because I choose to, every day that I wake up, every day that we fight or lie to each other. I choose him over and over again, and he chooses me.
love.author: Veronica Roth

love.text: ... I believe true love arises only when two people are completely in sync with each other’s music. And dance with them.”-Michael to Sophia.
love.author: Teresa May B. Bandiola

love.text: Those who are devoted to amusements; who love the society of those who love pleasure, have an aversion to religious exercises.
love.author: Ellen G. White

love.text: I laughed as we turned in a tight circle... 'Tonight you're all mine.'Jake smiled but looked me dead in the eye. 'No. From now on.'My heart skipped. 'What?'Yours,' he said simply, 'from now on.
love.author: Kieran Scott

love.text: Her hands warming on tea looked like chunks of knitting a child had felted in grubby palms. Enough decades, and a body slowly twists into one great cramp, but there was a time once, where she had been sexy, and if not sexy, at least odd-looking enough to compel. Through this clear window she could see how good it all had been. She had no regrets. That's not true, Mathilde. The whisper in the ear. Oh, Christ, yes, there was one. Solitary, gleaming, a regret. It was that all her life she had said no. From the beginning she had let so few people in. That first night, his young face glowing up a hers in the black light, bodies beating the air around them, and inside there was that unexpected sharp recognition, oh, this. A sudden peace arriving for her. She who hadn't been at peace since she was so little. Out of nowhere, out of this surprising night with its shatters of lightning and the stormy black campus outside, with the heat and song and sex and animal fear inside. He had seen her and made the leap and swung through the crowd and taken her hand, this bright boy who was giving her a place to rest. He offered not only his whole laughing self, the past that build him and the warm beating body that moved her with its beauty and the future she felt compressed and waiting, but also the torch he carried before him in the dark, his understanding, dazzling, instant, that there was goodness at her core. With the gift came the bitter seed of regret, the unbridgeable gap between the Mathilde she was and the Mathilde he had seen her to be. A question, in the end, of vision. She wished she'd been the kind Mathilde, the good one, his idea of her. She would have looked smiling down at him, she would've heard beyond marry me to the world that spun behind the words. There would have been no pause, no hesitation. She would've laughed, touched his face for the first time, felt his warmth in the palm of her hand.'Yes,' she would've said. 'Sure.
love.author: Lauren Groff

love.text: I turn my head so that he doesn't see my smile and secretly curse him for making me feel special.
love.author: Kasie West

love.text: She was learning something important: how to live within the sound of her own slow breathing, how to love the view when her eyes were shut.
love.author: Gwendoline Riley

love.text: We did all the tourist crap, but I just wanted to sit in a cafe and watch people.
love.author: Sara Shepard

love.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
love.author: Ted Chiang

love.text: I have dreams of becoming a professional pastry chef and having a little bakery - that's how much I love baking. I love to cook in general, but my heart lies in desserts.
love.author: Kim Barnouin

love.text: To live and love is a great fulfillment.
love.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

love.text: He thought of her often, and he missed the companionship they'd once shared and the friendship that had been the bedrock of their marriage at its best.
love.author: Nicholas Sparks

love.text: I remember how amazing it felt to be loved my him and how he was all I ever wanted.
love.author: Siobhan Davis

love.text: I always wondered if they’d change you.
love.author: Kiera Cass

love.text: The best thing you can do for yourself if you wish to see your dreams become reality is to find success and replicate it.
love.author: Mensah Oteh

love.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
love.author: Ally Condie

love.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: Love finds you, not the other way around, and you can’t run from it.
love.author: Dianna Hardy

love.text: We have to consciously study how to be tender with each other until it becomes a habit because what was native has been stolen from us, the love of Black women for each other.
love.author: Audre Lorde

love.text: They did not use the sonic stunners but the foray gun, the ancient weapon that fires a set of metal fragments in a burst. They shot to kill him. He was dying when I got to him, sprawled and twisted away from his skis that stuck up out of the snow, his chest half shot away. I took his head in my arms and spoke to him, but he never answered me; only in a way he answered my love for him, crying out through the silent wreck and tumult of his mind as consciousness lapsed, in the unspoken tongue, once, clearly, 'Arek!' Then no more. I held him, crouching there in the snow, while he died. They let me do that. Then they made me get up, and took me off one way and him another, I going to prison and he into the dark.
love.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

love.text: You know when you’re on a course that you know is the right one. You can’t explain it, you can’t define it, you don’t know how you got there or what all the obstacles will be, you just know the end result will be amazing and it will be worth it. That was the road I was on. Full speed ahead, no blinkers or turn signals, just cruise control.
love.author: Shelly Crane

happiness.text: You will find the greatest happiness in letting yourself be.
happiness.author: A.D. Posey

happiness.text: Happiness is a habit,it’s more than fleeting,more than a disintegrating lozenge.
happiness.author: Brian D'Ambrosio

happiness.text: The goals of true education are to teach acceptance, tolerance, and nonviolence.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: You will not able to find peace if you are the source of unhappiness for others.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: You can'tstop dreamingjust becausethe night neverseems toend.
happiness.author: Curtis Tyrone Jones

happiness.text: We cannot really love anybody with whom we never laugh.
happiness.author: Agnes Repplier

happiness.text: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: People genuinely happy in their choices seem less often tempted to force them on other people than those who feel martyred and broken by their lives.
happiness.author: Jane Rule

happiness.text: Be helpful. When you see the darkness, be the light. When you feel the hatred, be the source of love. In the end love always win.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: It required all his delicate Epicurean education to prevent his doing something about it; he had to repeat over to himself his favorite notions: that the injustice and unhappiness in the world is a constant; that the theory of progress is a delusion; that the poor, never having known happiness, are insensible to misfortune. Like all the rich he could not bring himself to believe that the poor (look at their houses, look at their clothes) could really suffer. Like all the cultivated he believed that only the widely read could be said to know that they were unhappy.
happiness.author: Thornton Wilder

happiness.text: People who have wellbeing and feel fulfilled, need far less than people who feel unfulfilled, who always seem to need more.' By Rethinking Your Mindset you can create SWIFT sustainable success.
happiness.author: Tony Dovale

happiness.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: It is painful those feelings of pain,but accept it with love to see the gain.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
happiness.author: Ted Chiang

happiness.text: The demarcation between a positive and a negative desire or action is not whether it gives you a immediate feeling of satisfaction but whether it ultimately results in positive or negative consequences.
happiness.author: Dalai Lama XIV

happiness.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: I have no wealth or splendors to give, but I have love and smiles to share.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: In the midst of life’s ups and down, beginnings and endings, let us live our life, let us be joyful, let us be happy.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Travel as much as you can because your life is not bigger than this world...!!!
happiness.author: M.Rehan Behleem

happiness.text: Happiness doesn't come from doing what we like to do but from liking what we have to do.
happiness.author: Wilferd Peterson

happiness.text: Anyone who's a great kisser I'm always interested in.
happiness.author: Cher

happiness.text: Simplicity is the best strategy.Reciprocity is the best policy.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: I am loving.I am caring.I am inspiring.I am daring.I am always kind.I have peace of mind.I am worthy of trust.I am true and just.I am compassionate. I am passionate.I am a seeker.I am a giver.I am very simple.I am an example.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: We must realise that cognitive hygiene is as important subject as oral hygiene for healthy and happy existence.
happiness.author: Aditya Ajmera

happiness.text: To promote peace, promote understanding. To promote understanding, promote love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Did not the souls also of the righteous ask question of these things in their chambers, saying, 'How long shall I hope on this fashion?' when cometh the fruit of the floor of our reward?
happiness.author: Compton Gage

happiness.text: It was their secret, a secret meant for just the two of them, and she'd never been able to imagine how it would sound coming from someone else. But, somehow, Logan made it sound just right.
happiness.author: Nicholas Sparks

happiness.text: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
happiness.author: Don Marquis

positive.text: Learn from the sun; it is warm to everyone, and is therefore never in short supply of those who adore it.
positive.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

positive.text: We only need grace to endure every situation.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Subject to the law(s) of nature, hate is born to die.
positive.author: T.F. Hodge

positive.text: Whatever you did today is enough. Whatever you felt today is valid. Whatever you thought today isn't to be judged. Repeat the above each day.
positive.author: Brittany Burgunder

positive.text: Opportunities may surface clearly, but it takes a positive mind to see them. Positive people think and think possibilities even in difficulties and failing situations.
positive.author: Israelmore Ayivor

positive.text: The most beautiful period of time in our life are the ones which we understand that the problems are our own. And we should not blame other cause of our own problems, we need to realize that we are the one who control our own future, let's remember that maybe we will not have always a peaceful life and may not always be able to solve all of our problems that we face at once but we don't have to stop trying to find a solution way for it, we need to be positive and have courage and working hard to get what what we want cause I don't believe in excuses that most of us made but I believe in courage , being positive and hard working. Let's be positive and have courage.
positive.author: Arash Tabish

positive.text: Not every problem can be solved. Some are okay simply to avoid. Go around the, go under them, whatever it takes to reach your higher goal. Sometimes you have to fail your way to success.
positive.author: Anna Mitchael

positive.text: May we continue to encourage one another, so that we will increase in strength and in wisdom.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: God will help you if you try  and you can if you think you can.
positive.author: Anna Delaney Peale

positive.text: Self-education is self-empowerment.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: When God gives you an idea, you must act immediately on it.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The science of psychology has been far more successful on the negative than on the positive side... It has revealed to us much about man's shortcomings, his illnesses, his sins, but little about his potentialities, his virtues, his achievable aspirations, or his psychological health.
positive.author: Abraham Maslow

positive.text: Negative people feed off of your anger, let them starve.
positive.author: Samantha M. King

positive.text: Don’t be a victim of circumstances. Choose victory by gracious endurance.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Keep your promises and be consistent. Be the kind of person others can trust.
positive.author: Roy T. Bennett

positive.text: I will sacrifice today for tomorrow.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Daring life, graceful living.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: All great people had critics, but they still believe in beauty of their dreams.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Make success happen by striving and working to be the best. Aim at excellence and hit the target.
positive.author: Mark LaMoure

positive.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: If I had a party to attend and didn't want to be there  I would play the part of someone who was having a lovely time.
positive.author: Shirley MacLaine

positive.text: You have the power to realise your dream. If only you are willing and determined.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: By seeing how small the world is, I realize how capable I am. I can conquer anything. Anywhere. Anyone.
positive.author: Tawny Lara

positive.text: I think 'Heroes of Cosplay' will show a lot of the positive things, like how much effort it takes to make a costume. These people on the show aren't taking shortcuts. As long as that effort gets through to the viewers, we will be inspirational. Then there will be people who watch the show that want to get in and hands-on make outfits.
positive.author: Yaya Han

positive.text: Dwell on positive thoughts!
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge.
positive.author: Albert Einstein

positive.text: In any situation, listen and follow the first instinct, the sacred inner voice.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions  and not our circumstances.
positive.author: Martha Washington

positive.text: In high school, in sport, I had a coach who told me I was much better than I thought I was, and would make me do more in a positive sense. He was the first person who taught me not to be afraid of failure.
positive.author: Mike Krzyzewski

strength.text: You cannot occupy a proper place on earth without wisdom. It is the principal thing you must have.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Strength is not defined by the load you bear, it’s defined by the amount you can bend before breaking.
strength.author: Blake Mays

strength.text: We fall many times. But we find strength within to rise again.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: The Storms of This LifeWatching the distant clouds building and growing forevermoreThe harsh wind begins rushing thru the leaves with the branches bending to and froIn the attempts to not give in again I'm standing firm on all that I knowAnd extending out my hand reaching beyond the heavens aboveGrasping for His strength to hold on, along with the endurance to make it thruPraying that the ground beneath me will not erode nor engulf all that I love.
strength.author: Christine Upton

strength.text: The “right time’ is now. Go onward and fulfill your dream.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Without an anchor, we can be drifted to any shore. May you find hope as anchor.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: The weak may not be admired and hero-worshipped; but they are by no means disliked or shunned; and they never seem to have the least difficulty in marrying people who are too good for them. They may fail in emergencies; but life is not one long emergency: it is mostly a string of situations for which no exceptional strength is needed, and with which even rather weak people can cope if they have a stronger partner to help them out.
strength.author: George Bernard Shaw

strength.text: A father gives his child nothing better than a good education.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: Having ascended to some spiritual strength by focusing on the power of the feminine, it is no doubt tempting to wield this strength against that which triggers memories of having once been weaker.
strength.author: Thomm Quackenbush

strength.text: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: Its hardness and solidity had been an odd kind of comfort. Do not wish for anything. Be and endure. The Old African had learned that enduring was power too, and just as he had been drawn to the boulder, so the slaves, after a while, were drawn to him.
strength.author: Julius Lester

strength.text: How can the face that welcomed me into the world be the face I'll soon forget? How can the body I came through be the body I don't really know?
strength.author: Michelle Carithers

strength.text: Would he ever have the strength to stop looking?
strength.author: J.K. Rowling

strength.text: We think we are so strong but it is only when others try to prey on our weaknesses that we realize how frail we truly are.”-Skyla (from Twiceborn).
strength.author: JP Robinson

strength.text: Man's delight in the Lord is the absolute peak of human triumph. He praises God when full of joy, and when not, he praises God to become full of joy. For to know and to live as though God is worthy of all praise, in all one's circumstances, whether seemingly good or seemingly bad, is the primary definition of joy and the richest triumph for man under God.
strength.author: Criss Jami

strength.text: Life has moments that feel as if the sun has blackened to tar and the entire world turned to ice.  It feels as if Hades and his vile demons have risen from the depths of Tartarus solely for the purpose of banding to personally torture you, and that their genuine intent of mental, emotional, and spiritual anguish is tearing you to shreds.  Your heart weighs as heavily as leaden legs which you would drag yourself forward with if not for the quicksand that pulls you down inch by inch, paralyzing your will and threatening oblivion.  And all the while fire and brimstone pour from the sky, pelting only you.  Truly, that is what it feels like. But that feeling is a trial that won't last forever.  Never give up.
strength.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

strength.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Luck is for those with nothing else. I wish you strength and courage.
strength.author: Annette Marie

strength.text: When the fuel is dried up in a vehicle, it stops driving automatically. You are a vehicle in the spiritual and the physical world, so you need some oil for alacrity, in order to get to your destination. The greater the quantity of your oil, the more you cover the distance, and the more you cover the distance, the closer you get to your success.
strength.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

strength.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
strength.author: Ally Condie

strength.text: Her fatigue was gone; she felt vital and strong, like a tree coming back to life in the springtime, vibrant with sap, ready to put out buds and then blossoms.
strength.author: Linda Lael Miller

strength.text: WISDOM is the STRONGEST weapon you could EVER acquire in your LIFETIME.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: Never complain, pray for strength to overcome the difficulty.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Trolls must continually feed their bottomless need, so be strong and patiently wait out their fires of hatred for eventually they eat their own.
strength.author: L.M. Fields

strength.text: Be thankful to those who refuse to help you, for they force you to summon upon your warrior within.
strength.author: Miya Yamanouchi

strength.text: She can feel his blood, just beneath his skin; when he breathes, the air fills with smoke. He's like a dragon, ancient and fearless.
strength.author: Alice Hoffman

strength.text: Theres a remarkable amount of strength residing in those who move forward without being able to physically move. Ones that carry the weight of illness or a disability, they battle wars most know nothing about. They are the true warriors of the world, the ones who have every reason to quit but never do.
strength.author: Nikki Rowe

strength.text: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
strength.author: Bram Stoker

strength.text: Endure despite the pain. The key is grace of strength.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita
